snippet.title: The 38 geek movies of spring, summer, and early fall 2012
snippet.description: Our annual tradition of previewing the geek-centric theatrical movie releases of the year rounds up the 38 sci-fi, fantasy, horror, and generally geek-related flicks that will hit ...

snippet.title: Previews of the new Fall 2011 geek TV shows
snippet.description: American broadcast TV networks will be debuting their newest pilots in short order. We break down the programs that might interest geeks.
